pkgmetadata.longdescription: # py-redis-cachetoolscachetools core + redisRequirements:-------------redis 3.5.3Installation:------------- pip install py-redis-cachetoolsenv variables:------------- REDIS_HOST REDIS_DBUsage:------ import time import cachetools, cachetools.rcache # cache = cachetools.rcache.RedisCache(ttl=60) cache = cachetools.rcache.PrefixedRedisCache("hb-cachetools-cache", ttl=60) @cachetools.cached(cache=cache) def test(a, b): return { 'hi': 'hello' } a = 1 while True: print(test(a, 2)) print(a) time.sleep(1) a = a+1
